name: Doge Adventures - To The Moon!
description:
Doge Adventures- To The Moon! is a game based on the current cryptocurrency market events and the growth (and fall) of Dogecoin. In this game you take matters in your own hands and drive Doge to the moon yourself.

Gameplay

The player must avoid the obstacles in the run, collecting coins that allow for upgrades to be purchased and pick ups that either provide protection, health or fuel.

The game's core mechanic revolves around playing multiple runs before being able to beat the game. The player must focus on getting upgrades that help beating the game.

How to play Moving

The player can move by pressing on the right side of the screen to go right, and pressing on the left side of the screen to go left

Pickups

Pickups in a run can be as follows:

  • Fuel restoration
  • Health restoration
  • Shield that prevents damage from obstables
  • Coin that allows to purchase upgrades
Upgrades

Each upgrade has 5 levels. The first upgrade costs 15 DOGE and each level costs +5 DOGE. The upgrades within the game are as follows:

  • Fuel pickups restore 5/8/12/15/20 fuel based on the upgrade level.
  • Health pickups restore 5/10/15/20/25 health based on the upgrade level.
  • Shield pickups block damage for 4/6/7/8/10 seconds based on the upgrade level.
  • Picked up coins grant 1/3/5/8/10 DOGE based on upgrade level.
Platforms
  • Android
